name: Cuisine Gastronome Italiano Penne Pasta
description: ‘Cuisine Gastronome’, designed as the ultimate solution to the rising demand for good quality frozen meals, is made with the finest fresh ingredients with no added preservatives. Offering a delicious range of local and international favourites, fit for the palettes of the world’s most discerning food connoisseurs. Cuisine Gastronome offers sheer convenience with the quickest solution to a fabulous meal in minutes.* Images for illustration purpose only. Product recieved may vary.
